description: Try a veggie patty with a twist, loaded with broccoli and parmesan. Whip together these easy veggie burgers for a delicious budget-friendly dinner.
name: Cheesy Broccoli Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g broccoli, cut into small florets, stems reserved

recipeInstructions.text: Cook broccoli florets and stems in a small saucepan of boiling water for 3 minutes or until tender. Drain. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate. Pat broccoli with paper towels to remove excess moisture.
Place broccoli, onion, garlic, breadcrumbs, flour, egg and parmesan in a food processor. Process until chopped and combined (do not overprocess). Season with pepper. Shape mixture into 4 patties.

Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook patties for 4 minutes or until a golden crust forms, then carefully turn over and cook for a further 4 minutes or until golden and heated through. Remove pan from heat, then place cheese slices over patties.

Meanwhile, prepare coleslaw according to packet instructions. Spread roll bases with mustard. Top each with a patty, followed by a little coleslaw. Sandwich with roll tops. Serve with remaining coleslaw.
